ygData.subject: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow Wizards, I just wanted to introduce myself.  I am Olatan Ossur, an Erudite Wizard at the beginning of his 4th season in the trenches.  Currently,
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow Wizards,

I just wanted to introduce myself. I am Olatan Ossur, an Erudite Wizard at
the beginning of his 4th season in the trenches. Currently, I'm playing on
Erollisi Marr. You can find me wandering around Tox (usually lost...)
looking for small critters of evilness to burn.

If you see me wandering around, just say "Hi!".

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
+ Olatan Ossur | +
+ 4th Wizard | Hopelessly Lost in Tox +
+ Erollisi Marr | +
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
